page.title: 02Proj 1 Shopping in Torpoint
page.content: { Shopping in Torpoint { { }Torpoint is quite a large town,but we do not think there enough shops for a town of this size.We think there are not enough shops because it is so near to Plymouth.However there is a problem of getting to Plymouth,the ferry to get across to Plymouth always has long queues.A survey was done of people shopping in Torpoint. { }Here are the questions they were asked: { Shoppers questions. { 1. Where do you do your main grocery {shopping? { a)Torpoint b)Plymouth c)Other towns { 2. Has Torpoint got enough shops? { a) Yes b)No { 3. What sort of new shops would you {like to see in Torpoint? { }
